name: FreskPage
overview:
You’re good to develop great products, we’re good to help you tell the world about them!

We love software products development and we are very enthusiastic with the lean startup approach. We also know that product promotion is as important as product development. And with the continuous deployment, you work fast to improve the product almost every day. Same for product promotion!

We provide a web platform which allow you to create, publish and optimize product pages in the easiest and fastest way you have experienced.

So you can spend more time on users’ feedback and product development, which is crucial in your early stages.

Feel free to get in touch with us and we’ll see how we can help you!
